summary: Completed comprehensive testing of UNAD Queue Management System. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all endpoints working correctly. Frontend has some React component issues but core functionality is operational.

ui_bugs.issue: Select.Item components missing value prop causing runtime errors
ui_bugs.details: Error: 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string' - affects dropdowns in reports and user management

ui_bugs.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility
ui_bugs.details: Accessibility warnings for user and service creation dialogs

integration_issues.details: WebSocket connection to wss://academia-queue.preview.emergentagent.com/socket.io/ fails - real-time updates not working

integration_issues.issue: Reports page fails to load due to Select component errors
integration_issues.details: Page timeout due to Select component runtime errors

issues: Layout and spacing appropriate for institutional use
affected_screen: All pages use correct color scheme: #F47920, #F0B429, #005883

passed_tests: All backend API endpoints (25/25 tests passed)
JWT authentication for all 3 roles (admin, funcionario, vap)

success_percentage.frontend: 70% (7/10 major flows working, 3 have component issues)

critical_fixes: Fix Select component value prop errors in Reports and User management forms
Resolve WebSocket connection issues for real-time updates
Add proper aria-describedby attributes to Dialog components for accessibility
action_item_for_main_agent.details: Backend is fully functional. Frontend core features work but has React component errors that prevent some pages from loading properly. WebSocket real-time functionality is not working.
